original_text: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe: for there is no difference:
korean_text: 곧 예수 그리스도를 믿음으로 말미암아 모든 믿는 자에게 미치는 하나님의 의니 차별이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: which is by faith of Jesus Christ
unto all and upon all them that believe
